attributes.action: Privacy law for trampolines which prevent you having privacy in your garden/home
attributes.additional_details: Sadly I am sure there is not only me who does suffer this problem and there is nowhere that you can turn to for help or advice and you just feel so alone and helpless and dismayed that you can no longer ever get to enjoy your garden as you used to as some people simply cannot show a little consideration and I would so appreciate your help with this.
attributes.background: My neighbour put a large trampoline at our adjoining fence depriving me of any privacy in my small garden//kitchen.When I go into the garden the children shout&taunt my dog.I attempted to explain my discomfort&lack of privacy she snarled never moving it, got a problem?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Privacy law for trampolines which prevent you having privacy in your garden/home". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
